author: Croco, Boku
instructions: This is a Character Sheet for a Unofficial Fanmade Pokemon Tabletop Roleplaying game, called Pokeymanz. It uses the Savage Worlds engine and a lot of other inspiration as its basis. The rules and additional content can be downloaded for free on the [creators site](https://chronicdelusionist.neocities.org/Pokeymanz/index.html).
